user_query: I want to surprise my sister with a gift for her birthday. Can you recommend a popular product with good reviews? Additionally, fetch the last 10 matches played by the home team for ID 81930 and search for the social profile links of John Smith on Instagram and Snapchat.

TaskList.description: Recommend a popular product with good reviews.
Fetch the last 10 matches played by the home team for ID 81930.
Search for social profile links of John Smith on Instagram and Snapchat.
